Package smac.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigurationFileNotFoundException
    The ConfigurationFileNotFoundException class is the exception raised when the configuration required for the SMAC daemon could not be found.
    DuplicateLockException
    The DuplicateLockException class is the exception raised when a lock for a SMAC daemon task input file already exist.
    DuplicateRuleException
    The DuplicateRuleException class is the exception raised when a rule with the same rule set and order has been defined more than once in the SMAC daemon configuration file.
    InvalidConfigurationFileException
    The InvalidConfigurationFileException class is the exception raised when the configuration required for the SMAC daemon does not appear to be valid.
    InvalidInputQueueConfigurationException
    The InvalidInputQueueConfigurationException class is the exception thrown when the given queue configuration could not be parsed.
    InvalidOutputQueueConfigurationException
    The InvalidOutputQueueConfigurationException class is the exception thrown when the given output queue configuration could not be parsed.
    InvalidQueueTypeNameException
    The InvalidQueueTypeNameException class is the exception thrown when the given queue type name could not be matched to a SMAC queue type.
    InvalidRuleDefinitionException
    The InvalidRuleDefinitionException class is the exception raised when a rule has not been properly defined in the SMAC daemon configuration file.
    RuleNotFoundException
    The RuleNotFoundException class is the exception raised when a rule for a SMAC daemon routing task could not be found.
    UndefinedOutputQueueException
    The UndefinedOutputQueueException class is the exception thrown when an output queue has not been defined.
